Banner.Description: I am an Intern Fullstack Developer focusing on building web applications with Angular, Spring Boot, and Django. I'm also leaning Asp.net and React to broaden my skills,Passionate about learning and challenges, I aim to contribute to real-world projects with scalable, high-quality applications
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As an Intern Fullstack Developer, I continuously improve my programming skills through learning, working on personal projects, and exploring new technologies in the industry.
Currently, I focus on strengthening my skills with Angular, Spring Boot, and Django, while also expanding my knowledge of ASP.NET Core and React.
Throughout my development journey, I emphasize database design, API development, business logic handling, and integrating frontend – backend to deliver complete web applications.
My goal is to become a strong Fullstack Developer, contributing to real-world projects with high-quality, scalable solutions that deliver long-term value.
Education.Title: Education

Description: Currently pursuing coursework in Software Engineering and Database Systems
Studying multíubject, most interest in Asp.net core and SQL server
Active in team projects and research assignments
Specialized in <span class='underline'>Mathematics<span class='underline'> and English
Graduated with strong foundation in problem-solving and logical thinking
Focused on Java, Python, Spring Boot, Angular
Practicing Data Structures & Algorithms for technical interviews

WebDev.Title: Web Development
WebDev.Description: Building scalable, responsive, and high-quality web applications using modern frameworks like Angular, SpringBoot and Django

DevOps.Title: DevOps
DevOps.Description: Implementing CI/CD pipelines, system automation, and monitoring to improve development workflow and deployment efficiency.

Mobile.Title: Mobile Development
Mobile.Description: Creating mobile applications with cross-platform support, focusing on user-friendly interfaces and scalability.

Project.Title: My Projects
Project.Label: Highlighted Project

Project.Projects.Title: Gym Management
Project.Projects.Description: A website for gym members to track activities, manage personal information, create workout plans, and analyze progress.

Project.Projects.Title: Taking Notes
Project.Projects.Description: A website for all registered users that allows taking personal notes securely.This application implements multiple layers of security including OAuth(Google, Facebook), JWT, and MFA(Google Authentication) to ensure that no unauthorized access can compromise your notes.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hotel Manager
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: The website that allows users to check available rooms, view room details, and make reservations easily

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Online Ordering Food
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A user-friendly website for ordering food, viewing menu items, selecting ingredients, and tracking your orders

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Cosmetics ecommerce
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A full-featured e-commerce website for browsing products, adding items to cart, placing orders, making online payments, managing user accounts, writing reviews, and using coupons and wishlists.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Library
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project that that allows users to browse available books, borrow and return books, search for titles, and manage their library accounts.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: Whether you have a question, a project idea, or just want to say hello, I’d love to hear from you. Feel free to reach out anytime!
